home.h2: Easy to access secure internet at anywhere
home.ad-title: Be hurry to Extend your plan
home.ad-text: Your private and secure internet is losing, go extend now
home.div-content: EasyVPN defeats content restrictions and censorship to deliver unlimited access to video, music, social media, and more, from anywhere in the world.
home.el-row2-content: Do you use Windows at work, macOS at home, and Linux for your special projects? No problem. There’s a EasyVPN application for each of these, plus apps for iOS, Android, and Android TV. Oh, and also encrypted proxy extensions for Chrome and Firefox. Best of all, with one EasyVPN account, you can secure up to 6 devices at the same time.
home.el-row3-h3: Anytime, anywhere, enjoy fast and stable connection
home.el-row3-content: Does Internet buffering affect our mood? Is it unacceptable to have to wait while watching video or downloading files? Don’t worry, with the 5700 EasyVPN services in 60 Countris or  regions. The more servers, the lower the load, and the more widely distributed the servers, the more opportunities users have to find servers closer together.

apps.dec: Enjoy secure and private access to the internet
apps.el-row1-div: Use social media, shop online and check your bank account balance on public Wi-Fi hotspots. Just one click and you’re protected.
apps.el-row2-div: The freedom is yours: EasyVPN offers thousands of servers in 60 countries. That means a fast and stable connection wherever you are.
apps.el-row3-div: Dive into the movies and TV shows you love. Do all that in full privacy and security ensured by military-grade encryption.
